mapper.insert: insert into music(music_no, music_title, music_artist, music_album, release_time) values(music_seq.nextval, #{musicTitle}, #{musicArtist}, #{musicAlbum}, #{releaseTime})
mapper.update: update music set music_title=#{musicTitle}, music_artist=#{musicArtist}, music_album=#{musicAlbum}, release_time=#{releaseTime} where music_no=#{musicNo}
mapper.select: select * from music where instr(${type}, #{keyword}) > 0 order by ${type} asc
